org.dyn4j.collision.narrowphase

Interface DistanceDetector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Gjk

    public interface DistanceDetector
    Interface representing an algorithm to detect the distance between two convex shapes.
    Since:
    1.2.0
    Version:
    1.2.0
    Author:
    William Bittle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean distance(Convex convex1, Transform transform1, Convex convex2, Transform transform2, Separation separation)
      Returns true if the two shapes are separated and fills the given Separation object with the minimum distance vector, distance, and closest points.

    • Method Detail

      • distance

        boolean distance(Convex convex1,
               Transform transform1,
               Convex convex2,
               Transform transform2,
               Separation separation)
        Returns true if the two shapes are separated and fills the given Separation object with the minimum distance vector, distance, and closest points.
        Parameters:
        convex1 - the first Shape
        transform1 - the first Shape's Transform
        convex2 - the second Shape
        transform2 - the second Shape's Transform
        separation - the Separation object to fill
        Returns:
        boolean
